relation: there 24/7 campus security who also help if someone has flat tire, locked their keys in the car or any other problem.
There are all sorts and types of club in the university such as sports, art, theater, debate, and many more.
Cameron University offers many options of helping its student pay their tuition. For instance, sports scholarship, financial aid or student employment on campus.
The school has different clubs, sports, theater, and dances that happens throughout the year and every students are invited and welcome to join.

The university offers different meal plans to all students. The cafeteria food are pretty awesome. There's also a snack bar in the campus and also many vending machines on every building of the campus.
The dorms are very cheap and safe. There are different kinds of dorms such single, double or apartment-like which all differ in prices. Students have the choice to decide what they want.

Cameron is academically challenging because it strives to provide quality education to its students. Its curriculum is designed to provide each student the necessary knowledge and skills in the chosen field.
With the economic status, Cameron offers a lot of different degree programs and its very cheap compared to most universities.
Cameron University is a great school. It offers a quality education at a very reasonable price. The campus and buildings are beautiful, clean and well-maintained.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {14406=On campus, Cameron University is always hosting social functions, including parties and outdoor events. The Aggie RecCenter has an indoor heated swimming pool and facilities for weightlifting, cardiovascular workouts, racquetball, basketball, and other physical activity. As for off-campus attractions, depending on your tastes there's more to do in the Lawton area than there is than in the rest of the land between Dallas and OKC. Nearby Lawton is the Wichita Mountain Wildlife Refuge, which hosts a number of activities throughout the year and is a great place for all sorts of outdoor recreation. Also nearby is Medicine Park, a small resort town-like community that features a variety of shops, restaurants, and come spring 2014 will also host an aquarium and natural sciences center. Lawton (and Medicine Park) are adjacent to Lake Lawtonka, which provides opportunities for fishing, boating, swimming and the like. If museums are more your thing, there's a few in the area; the Museum of the Great Plains, the Ft. Sill Museum, and the Comanche National Museum and Cultural Center., 130737=I live at home. My friends live in the dorms and they say it is very convenient for them. Their class is 8:00 A.M, they get up at 7:50. Pretty quick traveling, if you ask me. Get the most rest that way, I would think! But, they do mention that sometimes, there are parties on the same floor, or floor above them who do make the sleeping process hard., 69489=Make sure to apply for scholarships specifically the PLUS this scholarship has a firm deadline usually sometime in February., 157437=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 20473=Be sure to look into financial aid like a federal Pell Grant or Cameron University's General Scholarship. You can cut your fees almost in half this way. Be sure to apply for the general scholarship early! The initial deadline tends to be in the spring, around February. They only consider applicants after this point if they still have money left to award.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot The first semester I learned a great deal! I would say, more than most my time at high school combined! Cameron University is a great collage. People are friendly and helpful. I have amazing instructors, too! They are eager to help each student, and taught me more than I thought I would learn! Login to rate or flag the reviews Bronwen from Lawton, OK 08/05/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 35 Categories Comments Great for these types of students School is great for psychology students wanting to seek a masters degree, and those psych students who want to get licensed after grad school. It is also a good school for those who want to teach, any grade, and it is also good for those seeking a job in the criminal justice field. Tips for prospective students Don't be afraid to contact the advisers and ask all the questions you want
